item.title: D2: like Mermaid, but better. Syntax, installation, and practical usage tips
item.description: D2 is an open-source tool to design architectural layouts using a declarative syntax. It’s a textual format, which can also be stored under source control. Let’s see how it works, how you can install it, and some practical usage tips. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/architecture-notes/d2-diagrams/
